column5: Plexos documentation conflicts with itself here. It says that "1" means regional but Plexos reads in 0 as regional and 1 as nodal.
Could revise later. Loads computer less, Greg Brinkman says higher numbers don't help runtime much.
Maximum time before each ST step times out for small problems
Maximum time before each ST step times out for large problems
Distributed gen slack bus based on capacity
Formulate constraints upfront helps speed up solving when only enforcing interfaces
